headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.pwnedpasswords.com; img-src 'self' data:; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'
